description: The primary objective of the first intermediate course aims at building up students' communicative competence and assisting them in using Korean in their real-life situations. This goal will be achieved not only by the use of authentic materials, but also various student-centered activities that are highly contextualized in every day interactions. Students will be able to present information and exchange opinions on a variety of topics such as weather, fashion, travel, mailing, housing, public transportation, and shopping.
name: INTERMEDIATE KOREAN I: Korean Summer Language Institute
